item.title: How to Prepare Your Organization for a Ransomware Response Plan
item.description: Preparing and maintaining a well thought out ransomware response plan allows your organization to respond proactively to ransomware attacks. This preparation can significantly reduce the impact of a Ransomware incident and increase the chances of data recovery. We don’t want to end up with a brick to the face.
